title: More ESPN magazine fonts
content:
I know a few other fonts have been brought up from ESPN magazine but I have another that I have been wondering about. If anyone knows what these ones are that would be helpful.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116093645im_/http:/typophile.com/files/8thingsjakepeavy_4632.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116093645im_/http:/typophile.com/files/espncover_3664.jpg)
author: jsheldon

comments.content: Hmmm. Looks a lot like Foundry Gridnik ... but actually I think it's Blender from Die Gestalten.

wow that was fast! malbright you nailed it, it's definitely Blender. Thanks for you help.

Die Gestalten has a really nice typeface selection.

--------------------------------------  
 [www.jeffsheldon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116093645/http:/www.jeffsheldon.com/ "www.jeffsheldon.com")
To me it looks like House Industries [United](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116093645/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un_fonts_sans)
United has way too square cornering.
I agree... I'm pretty sure it's Blender. That's the one typeface from this magazine I could recognize.
